Some children with this disorder develop only minor neurological problems and have normal intelligence, while others may be severely disabled and die before their second decade of life.",NINDS,Porencephaly
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Porencephaly ?,The National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke (NINDS) and other institutes of the National Institutes of Health
